entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 2:19 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NNE 39 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2 except minus 6 inland.
